Class AbstractWeaponCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.isw2019.model.weaponcard.AbstractWeaponCard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WeaponCardInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CyberBlade, Electroscythe, Flamethrower, Furnace, GrenadeLauncher, HeatSeeker, Hellion, LockRifle, MachineGun, PlasmaGun, PowerGlove, RailGun, RocketLauncher, ShockWave, ShotGun, SledgeHammer, Thor, TractorBeam, VortexCannon, Whisper, ZX_2

    public abstract class AbstractWeaponCard
extends java.lang.Object
implements WeaponCardInterface

      • firstEffect

        public abstract void firstEffect(GameBoard gameBoard,
                                 Player attacker,
                                 java.util.ArrayList<Player> defenders,
                                 int[] coordinates)
                          throws NoEffectException,
                                 ErrorEffectException,
                                 DamageTrackException
        FIRSTEFFECT
        Parameters:
        gameBoard - is the Gameboard where players play
        attacker - is the player who use Weapon card
        defenders - are players attacked
        coordinates - some coordinates used to move players or to indicate squares to attack players
        Throws:
        ErrorEffectException - there is a problem during effect
        NoEffectException - there is not the effect
        DamageTrackException - there is a problem with Damage Track
